meanings: (정신·기운 등을) (의식을 되찾다) regain[recover] consciousness, (분별력을 찾다) come to (one's senses), get back to one's senses...

vlive.korean: [이제 정신 차린 지민] 뭐라고요? [Jimin got himself together again] Sorry? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.51
[효민 보내기 싫어서 정신차린 토끼 칭찬해] 한 곡만 더 할까요? Shall I sing another song? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [HYOMIN] 인싸가 되고싶은 효밍🐰 (HYOMIN playing with rabbit hat)
여기 차린 건 없지만. - 아니 분위기는 파티 분위기인데. There's not much. - These are party vibes though. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]우리가 만난 기적 X 앞터V (The miracle we met X Early Interview)
vlive.english: There's not much. - These are party vibes though.

vlive.korean: 차린 건 없지만... - 어쨌든 잘 먹겠습니다. I didn't prepare much... - Either way, we'll enjoy eating it. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]우리가 만난 기적 X 앞터V (The miracle we met X Early Interview)
vlive.english: I didn't prepare much... - Either way, we'll enjoy eating it.

vlive.korean: 아직 정신 못 차린 걸로. I guess it's not sane yet. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 1122다시돌아온 생방의 ㄴ끼ㅣㅁ
vlive.english: I guess it's not sane yet.
